name: Sock and the Dark Revenge
storyline:
Visit the comic book studio - "The Sock Heaven Company" from the perspective of the main character Tyler - the best artist of the studio. Something strange happened to the studio. The main characters of the comics: Sock, Hatty, Pasta and Turnipy came to life and took the form of ink monsters living in a dark studio. Tyler has long forgotten his name and who he is. Help the main character safely hide in the shelter and explore the secrets of the studio using his walkie-talkie.
It seems that someone is ready to help you.
